Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.25818457] 0% hemolysis at 9.2 mg/L , 1% hemolysis at 18.4 mg/L , 4% hemolysis at 36.8mg/L  , 10% hemolysis at 73.6 mg/L , 17% hemolysis at 147.1 mg/L , 22% hemolysis at 294.3 mg/L against human red blood cells

Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria

Literature.Title: Characterization of cell selectivity, physiological stability and endotoxin neutralization capabilities of a-helix-based peptide amphiphiles
Literature.Author: Zhi Ma, Dandan Wei, Ping Yan, Xin Zhu, Anshan Shan , Zhongpeng Bi
